publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4137 Mr Jamie Stone: Street Lighting - Safer Communities, Better Environmentâ€”That the Parliament notes the importance of good street lighting in tackling crime and improving public safety; further notes the potential environmental benefits that could result from the replacement of old lighting equipment with new energy efficient bulbs, and calls on the Scottish Executive to work with local authorities to develop a plan to provide Scotland with modern, efficient and effective street lighting.
S2M-4137 Street Lighting - Safer Communities, Better Environment (lodged on 17 March 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4137 Street Lighting - Safer Communities, Better Environment (lodged on 17 March 2006) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-4137 Street Lighting - Safer Communities, Better Environment (lodged on 17 March 2006) Linda Fabiani*
